2070600.name: FRACTURE IN SPACE
2070600.description:
The game


Fracture is a single player game, you play as a simple civilian who managed to survive a planetary conflict and who must now escape from a planet completely occupied by an unknown entity.

Gameplay


The player has no weapons, use the environment and the possibilities offers by him to bypass the enemies, or distract them or use some gadgets. You are not a soldier, just a normal man who wants to escape.

Pay attention to the character's hunger, thirst, fatigue, stress.

Mystery


Find out more about the entity that controls the world, and about all the different mysteries around it.

Game Engine


Fracture is built on top of Unreal Engine 5 and takes advantage of the next generation features.
2070600.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
